detail_desc: T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Jacket in stretch imitation suede with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button and concealed pockets in the side seams. Unlined.

Short dress in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the hips and a gathered skirt. Small frills around the armholes and waist. Unlined.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short dress in a soft linen and viscose weave with a collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Short sleeves and a tapered waist with a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in soft, pattern-knit organic cotton with straps that cross and fasten at the back with adjustable buttoning, and ribbed hems.
Cropped top in cotton jersey with overlocked edges at the top and hem and narrow, ribbed shoulder straps.
Baby Exclusive. Fully lined, textured swim pants with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with an embroidered bodice and broderie anglaise at the top and hem. Buttons at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, fluffy knit containing glittery threads with dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.
Boxer briefs in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Polo shirt in premium cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
Calf-length skirt in airy, patterned crêpe with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at one side and a flounced, wrapover front. Wide flounce at the hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Ankle-length culottes in woven fabric. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with covered elastication and a detachable belt with a plastic buckle. Side pockets and wide straight legs.
Pyjama bottoms in fleece with a ribbed elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Captain’s cap in woven fabric with elastication at the back and lining in a cotton weave.
Treggings in stretch twill with an elasticated waist and fake front pockets.

Blouse in a cotton weave with a broderie anglaise yoke, short, frilled collar and buttons down the front. Frill trim over the shoulders and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs.
Maxi dress in softly draping viscose jersey with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps. Unlined.
Ankle-length jersey trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Hi-tops in imitation suede with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Soft faux shearling linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Cardigan in a textured cotton knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and fake front pockets, Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Long dress in patterned, lightly crêped chiffon made from recycled polyester. Double yoke with decorative gathers, a draped V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top, and short cap sleeves. Smocked waist and a skirt with an asymmetric hem and a flounced trim. Jersey lined front and skirt.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and gently tapered legs with elasticated hems. Brushed inside.
Long-sleeved jersey body with a V-neck, wrapover front and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Striped vest top in stretch cotton jersey.
Hoop earrings in metal decorated with pearly plastic beads. Diameter 3 cm. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Trainers with lacing at the front, mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Blouse in a printed weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck, short sleeves with a decorative tab and button, and a rounded hem.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Vest top in ribbed jersey. Narrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps and a racer back. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot at the top.

Ski mittens in windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with folded seams, elastication at the wrists and top and reflective details. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the gloves together. Thinsulate™ lining. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Long-sleeved polo-neck top in airy jersey made from a viscose and silk blend.

Base layer set in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Top with long raglan sleeves, contrasting colour seams and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. The set is designed with the minimal number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with padded notch lapels and concealed press-studs down the front. Pockets in the side seams and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Long cardigan in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the back of the neck, cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Straight-style shirt in linen with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Jeans in stretch, supersoft denim. Relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Shaftless, no-show socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Top in sturdy jersey with a round neckline that has a small opening and button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length sleeves, flared cuffs with a pleat, and a straight-cut hem.
Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with embroidery. V-neck with a frill trim at the top and long sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved dress in cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, frills at the top, a seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Trousers in soft, patterned viscose jersey with an elasticated waist and wide legs.
Make-up bag in semi-transparent plastic with a zip at the top that continues half-way down each short side. Unlined. Size approx. 9x9.5x17.5 cm.
Sunglasses with patterned acetate frames and UV-protective, polarised lenses. Supplied in a fabric storage pouch.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and a seam and flounce at the hem.
Collarless jacket in a stretch viscose weave with a gently tapered waist, single hook-and-eye fastening and welt front pockets. Lined.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Regular waist, a zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Soft, textured-knit jumper with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in a softly draping viscose weave. High waist with pleats at the front and wide, covered elastication at the back, and diagonal side pockets.
Pull-on trousers in twill with adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist, fake front pockets, fake back pockets with decorative buttons, and tapered legs.

Coat in a felted wool blend containing some cashmere. Narrow notch lapels with a buttonhole, a chest pocket, flap front pockets, two inner pockets, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Long hooded top in velour with embroidered text on the front, long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long T-shirt in jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood and detachable tie belt at the waist.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes and a narrow heel strap. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-4Y).
Jumper in a soft, chunky knit containing some wool with long, slightly wider sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short skirt in washed cotton twill with a high paper bag waist and detachable belt. Zip fly and button, front pockets and back pockets.
Fitted long-sleeved top in soft stretch jersey made from organic cotton with a wide lace-trimmed neck.
Short, straight-cut dress in jersey made from a cotton blend with short sleeves.
Top in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, extra-long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket.

TOCA LIFE x H&M. Set with a vest top and pair of shorts in soft cotton. Vest top in jersey with a print motif on the front and contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and armholes. Knee-length shorts in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed, elasticated, drawstring waist.

Waterproof trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a padded edge and tongue, adjustable hook and loop tab at the front, a grosgrain loop at the back, and reflective details. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Playsuit in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a V-neck, press-studs at the top, long sleeves with wide cuffs and short legs.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, pair of leggings and accessory in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch and a print motif on the front. Leggings with foldover ribbing at the waist.
Trousers in a lightly brushed, fine knit. High waist with covered elastication and wide, gently flared legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft fleece with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a cotton rib knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless dress in soft, printed, gently draping viscose jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Foldaway waist bag in woven fabric with a large compartment with a two-way zip at the front and two small inner compartments. Adjustable waist strap with a plastic snap lock. Concealed, zipped compartment at the back in which the bag can be easily folded and enclosed, and a practical carry strap at the top when the bag is folded away. Size 8x16.5x38 cm. Size when folded 3x9.5x20 cm.
